name: Pizza Margherita
description: Classic Italian pizza with fresh mozzarella, tomatoes, and basil on a thin crust.

name: Cheeseburger
description: Juicy beef patty topped with melted cheese, lettuce, tomato, and pickles on a toasted bun.

name: Sushi Pasta
description: Fresh raw fish and vegetables wrapped in seasoned rice and nori seaweed.

name: CocaCola
description: Stir-fried rice noodles with eggs, tofu, shrimp, peanuts, and bean sprouts in a tangy sauce.

name: Caesar Salad
description: Crisp romaine lettuce, croutons, and parmesan cheese tossed in a creamy Caesar dressing.
